subject: Order #SSN3911, Missing the Base Plate
description_text:
Good evening,
I received the pedals today but there was no base plate in the package. The item order clearly says "Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 / Baseplate".
Please send the base plate ASAP.
Thank you. 
order #SSN3911Owen McLachlan10535 Gabacho Dr.San Diego, CA 92124760-470-8298

conversations.body_text: Hi Owen McLachlan,    We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by the shortage of floor stock in our U.S. warehouse. We will ship your order immediately upon receiving the item today.
